methods.description: Get bulk object properties by given path
methods.name: GetPropertiesByPath

parameters.description: If set will return properties on specified path and all the nested paths
parameters.name: recurse

methods.description: Validate bulk properties for setting by given paths
methods.name: ValidateSetPropertiesByPaths

parameters.description: The values offered (this may include read-only values and also paths which are not in the targetPaths)
parameters.name: dataSet

parameters.description: If true will validate properties on target paths and all their nested paths
parameters.name: includeInherited

methods.description: Set bulk properties by given paths
methods.name: SetPropertiesByPaths

parameters.description: The values offered (this may include read-only values and also paths which are not in the targetPaths)
parameters.name: dataSet

parameters.description: If true will set properties on target paths and all their nested paths
parameters.name: includeInherited
